    Reference

    All functions

    level_matcher() UpdateLevelsbyList() valid_factors()

    Tools to support DE analysis

    DEphe()

    Heatmap generator

    ExpsPlot()

    Makes expression plots via ggplot2

    ExpsPlot_Table()

    Converts ExpsPlot data to matrix format

    FactoWrapper() FactoWrapper_DFs() factoExtra_DFs()

    FactoWrapper for PCA/HCPC of Hotgenes objects

    fgsea_() fgsea_Results() GSEA_Plots() leadingGenes() plotEnrichment_() OntologyMethods() OntologyFunctions() msigdbr_wrapper_choices() msigdbr_wrapper()

    Support functions for GSEA

    HotgeneSets()

    Support functions for GSVA

    auxiliary_assays_features() auxiliary_assays_default() auxiliary_assays_() `auxiliary_assays_<-`() O_() coldata_() coldata_names() `coldata_<-`() designMatrix_() contrastMatrix_() Normalized_Data_() SampleIDs_() ExpressionSlots_() ExpressionData_() Output_DE_() contrasts_() Features_() Mapper_() `Mapper_<-`() Background_()

    Hotgenes class

    HotgenesDEseq2()

    Exports DESeq2 object to Hotgenes

    HotgenesUniversal()

    Creates a new Hotgenes object from user-provided objects.

    Hotgeneslimma()

    Exports limma DE analysis to Hotgenes

    tabPanel_Hotgenes() Shiny_Hotgenes_UI() Shiny_Hotgenes_Server() Shiny_Hotgenes()

    tabPanel_Hotgenes() provides UI for loaded Hotgenes object

    VennDiagram_UI_inputs_support() VennDiagram_UI_main_support() VennDiagram_Server_module() PCA_UI_inputs_support() PCA_UI_main_support() PCA_Server_module() Metadata_UI_main_support() Metadata_Server_module() DE_pheUI() DE_pheServer() fgsea_UI_inputs_support() fgsea_UI_main_support() fgsea_Server_module() ExpsPlot_UI_inputs_support() ExpsPlot_UI_main_support() ExpsPlot_Server_module() DEstats_UI_inputs_support() DEstats_UI_main_support() DEstats_Server_module() BoxPlot_UI_inputs_support() BoxPlot_UI_main_support() BoxPlot_Server_module() AuxAssays_sidepanel() AuxAssays_mainpanel() AuxAssays_server()

    Modules for Shiny_Tabs

    TabCondition()

    Provides the condition for when a specific tab is active

    UI_download_file() Server_download_file()

    shiny download handler as a module

    UI_download_plot() Server_download_plot() UI_interactive_plot() Server_interactive_plot()

    shiny plot download handler

    VPlot()

    Hotgenes volcano plot

    Venn_Report()

    Generates VennDiagrams from lists

    coldata_palettes()

    Converts a coldata data.frame to a color palette.

    hotList_mapper() hotList_Feature()

    filters Mapper across all columns with hotList

    limma_paired_contrasts()

    Makes string model from variables

    na_check()

    checks a vector for missing strings

    parse_mapper_aliases()

    Returns a named list showing where the aliases are found

    required_DE_cols()

    internal required DE table column names

    required_DE_numeric_cols()

    internal required DE table column names

    update_object()

    update_object updates object class

    parse_features() DE() DEPlot() DECoefs() DExps() BoxPlot()

    Returns a named list showing where the features are found
